summary: This document is a response from T-Mobile USA to a subpoena dated April 17, 2008, requesting subscriber information for a specific mobile number. It provides billing account details for Elias Giagougakis, whose account was canceled in 2006 for non-payment.

persons.name: Elias Giagougakis
persons.context: The individual whose subscriber information is being provided in response to a subpoena; his T-Mobile account was established in 2004 and canceled for non-payment in 2006.

persons.name: Barbara Cooper
persons.role: T-Mobile Law Enforcement Relations Group representative
persons.context: The T-Mobile employee who signed the response letter to the subpoena and provided the subscriber information.

events.title: Subpoena issued for T-Mobile records
events.description: A subpoena was issued requesting subscriber information for a specific T-Mobile mobile number.

events.title: T-Mobile responds to subpoena
events.description: T-Mobile USA, Inc. was served with the subpoena and provided a written response with the requested subscriber information.

events.title: T-Mobile account established
events.description: Elias Giagougakis established a T-Mobile post-paid account.

events.title: T-Mobile account canceled
events.description: Elias Giagougakis's T-Mobile account was canceled due to non-payment.

keyFacts: A subpoena was issued on April 17, 2008, for T-Mobile subscriber information related to a specific mobile number.
T-Mobile's response, dated June 19, 2008, identified the subscriber as Elias Giagougakis.
Elias Giagougakis's T-Mobile account was established on October 14, 2004, and canceled for non-payment on September 3, 2006.
The document indicates law enforcement was investigating or seeking information linked to this mobile number in 2008.
The response was handled by Barbara Cooper of T-Mobile's Law Enforcement Relations Group.
